## Section 1

```{r}
police_killings
```


x-axis: `h_income`

y-axis: number of people falling into each bin of household income

color coded to races 

```{r graph1, message=FALSE}
ggplot(data=police_killings, aes(h_income)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(fill = raceethnicity)) + 
  facet_wrap(~state) + 
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set1")
```


```{r graph_random, message=FALSE}
ggplot(data = police_killings, aes(state))+
  coord_flip()+
  geom_bar(aes(x = state, stat = "count", fill = raceethnicity))
```
